title: Hero MotoCorp expects 2-wheeler industry to make strong comeback in FY23
description: The company, which reported sales of 12.92 lakh units in the December quarter, also expects the various announcements made in the Union Budget this year to trigger a cycle not only of employment and income but also capex in the private sector.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
